tier.item: b. Der Bauer, der die Kuh, die schlechte Milch gab schlachtete ist krank. (Hawkins, 1994).
the farmer who the cow which bad milk gave killed is sick.
"The farmer who killed the cow which gave bad milk is sick".
b. Der Bauer, der die Kuh, die schlechte Milch gab schlachtete ist krank. (Hawkins, 1994).

the farmer who the cow which bad milk gave killed is sick.
The farmer who killed the cow which gave bad milk issick".
(3) John-wa Bill-ni Mary-ga Sue-ni Bob-o syookai sita to it-ta.
John-TOP Bill-DAT Mary-NOM Sue-DAT Bob-ACC introduced say
"John said to Bill that Mary introduced Bob to Sue". (Lewis, 1993)
(3) John-wa Bill-ni Mary-ga Sue-ni Bob-o syookai sita to it-ta.

"John said to Bill that Mary introduced Bob to Sue". (Lewis, 1993)
John-wa Bill-ni Mary-ga Sue-ni Bob-o syookai sita to it-ta.

John said to Bill that Mary introduced Bob toSue".
